page.title: 16My House
page.content: My house is modern and detached, it has eleven rooms plus landing, hall and airing cupboard. There is the kitchen in which is a refrigerator, table and chairs, a sink, food cupboards and electric cooker. Next there is the dining room where we eat on Sundays and when we have guests. Inthe lounge we have just had an extention. In here is a suite of furniture, television, a plant, record player and video. The next room is the study, we have a piano, telephone and sewing machine. We keep in the utility room my hamster and gerbils and our washing machine, freezer and tumble drier. Next to that room is the toilet. Up stairs is the bathroom in which is a bath, toilet, sink and shower. We have got four bedrooms one of which is spare. In these is mainly one bed and cupboards.
